name: VaricellaTestsForVaricellaZosterVirusAntigen
title: Varicella (Tests for Varicella zoster virus Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Varicella zoster virus antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Varicella zoster Ag),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
